list.title: Expediting and logistics coordinator
list.description: Management of multiple projects from supplier expediting and multimodal transportation to factories and customers.
tasks: Management of purchase requisition and purchase orders on SAP
Vendors follow-up (KOM, documents reminder, monthly planning analysis)
Development of transportation solutions based on delivery times, costs, tax laws and regulations
Anticipation, recommendation to project manager on packaging, restrictions, transportation constraints related to the country and material (including out of gauge, heavy parcels)
Issuance, management of licenses/import lists in China
Administrative tasks: export, import document issuance, reporting, invoicing
Client side delivery (Argentina, Saudi Arabia, China, Europe, Russia) or workshop (China, Romania)

list.title: Logistics Coordinator
list.description: Coordination of oversize material/equipment transportation from Europe, Asia, and the Middle East to yards in China and a site in Russia.
tasks: Team leader of a team of 6 people
Approximately 120 shipments per week
Anticipation of country issues
Transport PO management
Transportation cost optimization
Reporting management (diffusion and update daily)
Various administrative tasks: checking compliance with transport documents and preparing export and import documents

list.title: Export and Commercial Transit Agent
list.description: Resale and shipment of electrical industrial equipment to construction companies in North Africa, Sudan, and Saudi Arabia.
tasks: Supplier negotiation (German, English, Italian)
Goods inspection and air/sea transportation organization
Administrative tasks: preparation of shipping documents (a-z), customs declaration under TELOS

list.title: Assistant Manager
list.description: Organization of boat courses and customer relations.
tasks: Other: ecotourism - Jujuy region in Argentina
Woofing in a Quechua community - Daily agricultural activities and aid to the community's tourist development.

list.title: Industrial Project Forwarding Agent
list.description: Organization of sea/air transport of industrial material (+300T) from Europe to Africa and Brazil using FCL/LCL containers, Flat rack, and conventional methods for CAC 40 companies.
tasks: Freight analysis for optimized logistics solution
Planning containers position at the factory
BL/LTA instructions and completion of various BIETC (taxed import documents)
Shipment tracking, customer reporting, and invoicing

list.title: Call Account and Dispute Manager
list.description: Administrative and financial management of ship owner portfolio.
tasks: Upstream work with west African port agents
Invoicing port disbursements and services to ship owners
Tariff management and bank reconciliation
Dispute management

list.title: Industrial Project Forwarding Agent
list.description: Organization and transportation of electrical equipment from Europe to Africa (Algeria and Benin) on construction sites for a turnkey contract with the client
tasks: Purchasing follow-up, priority management, export document preparation, letter of credit, and dispute management

list.diploma: Management and Design of Logistics and Transport Chain Bachelor's degree
